title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 26 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 26 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Bernie and Democrats remain a bigger threat than coronavirus. Dems trying to weaponize coronavirus against Trump. Dems answer to everything is always more money. Open borders is the biggest help to the coronavirus. All day long coronavirus panic. What Rush saw watching the Democrat debate: Candidates raising their hands begging for permission to speak. Dems don't oppose Bernie because he's a socialist, they just think he can't win. Democrats invoke Rush's name, Medal of Freedom, in coronavirus debate. Azar, Fauci, Gupta, CDC all agree the risk from coronavirus is low. Biden claims 150 million people a year die from guns. Pelosi: Trump's coronavirus spending is shameful, too late, anemic. Former Senator William Cohen forms group to improve Congress. CNN's John King on Rush and coronavirus. Percentage of Americans who get the flu every year.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Dems, Drive-Bys inject Rush into coronavirus debate, desperately hope he's wrong. Conrad Black: Trump could win historic landslide over Crazy Bernie. Biden answers question on black vote by saying he visited "the projects". Media targeting Rush because he's the only one cautioning against coronavirus panic. San Francisco declares state of emergency over coronavirus, despite not having a reported case yet. Rush is only voice opposing Democrat/media-generated panic. Did the ChiComs release the coronavirus on purpose? Why is media so obsessed with a guy on the radio?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Why are Drive-Bys so obsessed with a guy on the radio? Bloomberg says he bought the Democrat Congress. What Trump will say at his 6PM coronavirus statement. Bloomberg got booed at debate for saying the Russians are helping Bernie, after 3 years of Democrats crying Russia, Russia, Russia. Democrats lose special election in Kentucky. Florida Dems sue to remove Crazy Bernie from ballot. Plugs up big in SC poll. Mayor Pete struggling with black voters. Coronavirus vs. flu mortality rates. Kentucky special election. Nepotism is everywhere. CDC: Men should shave beards to prevent spread of coronavirus.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
